param.label: ms
param.name: ms
param.help: Optional csv input. Features as columns, rows as samples. Column header mz_rt

param.label: idmsms
param.name: idmsms
param.help: Optional idMSMS / MSe csv data. same dim and names as ms required

param.label: sampNameCol
param.name: sampNameCol
param.help: which column from the csv file contains sample names?

param.label: featdelim
param.name: featdelim
param.help: Only required if ms input is set! How feature mz and rt are delimited in csv import column header e.g. ='-'

param.label: timepos
param.name: timepos
param.help: which position in delimited column header represents the retention time (csv only)

param.label: MStag
param.name: MStag
param.help: character string in 'taglocation' to designat MS / MSe files e.g. '01.cdf'

param.label: idMSMStag
param.name: idMSMStag
param.help: character string in 'taglocation' to designat idMSMS / MSe files e.g. '02.cdf'

param.label: taglocation
param.name: taglocation
param.help: 'filepaths' by default, 'phenoData[,1]' is another option. refers to xcms slot

param.label: sr
param.name: sr
param.help: sigma r - correlational similarity decay value

param.label: deepSplit
param.name: deepSplit
param.help: controls how agressively the HCA tree is cut - see ?cutreeDynamicTree

param.label: blocksize
param.name: blocksize
param.help: number of features (scans?) processed in one block =1000,

param.label: mult
param.name: mult
param.help: internal value, can be used to influence processing speed/ram usage

param.label: hmax
param.name: hmax
param.help: precut the tree at this height, default 0.3 - see ?cutreeDynamicTree

param.label: collapse
param.name: collapse
param.help: reduce feature intensities to spectrum intensities?

param.label: usePheno
param.name: usePheno
param.help: transfer phenotype data from XCMS object to SpecAbund dataset?

param.label: normalize
param.name: normalize
param.help: either 'none', 'TIC', 'quantile', or 'batch.qc' normalization of feature intensities. see batch.qc overview in details.

param.label: qc_inj_range
param.name: qc_inj_range
param.help: how many injections around each injection are to be scanned for presence of QC samples when using batch.qc normalization? A good rule of thumb is between 1 and 3 times the typical injection span between QC injections. i.e. if you inject QC ever 7 samples, set this to between 7 and 21. smaller values provide more local precision but make normalization sensitive to individual poor outliers (though these are first removed using the boxplot function outlier detection), while wider values provide less local precision in normalization but better stability to individual peak areas.

param.label: minModuleSize
param.name: minModuleSize
param.help: how many features must be part of a cluster to be returned? default = 2

param.label: linkage
param.name: linkage
param.help: hierarchical clustering linkage method - see ?hclust

param.label: mzdec
param.name: mzdec
param.help: number of decimal places used in printing m/z values

param.label: cor_method
param.name: cor_method
param.help: which correlational method used to calculate 'r' - see ?cor

param.label: rt_only_low_n
param.name: rt_only_low_n
param.help: At low injection numbers, correlational relationships of peak intensities may be unreliable. by defualt ramclustR will simply ignore the correlational r value and cluster on retention time alone. if you wish to use correlation with at n less than 5, set this value to FALSE.

param.label: replace_zeros
param.name: replace_zeros
param.help: NA, NaN, and Inf values are replaced with zero, and zero values are sometimes returned from peak peaking. When TRUE, zero values will be replaced with a small amount of noise, with noise level set based on the detected signal intensities for that feature.

param.label: Merge MSP Files
param.name: merge_msp
param.help: Whether to merge all msp in one file or export one msp per spectra

param.label: st
param.name: st
param.help: sigma t - time similarity decay value

param.label: fftempdir
param.name: fftempdir
param.help: valid path: if there are file size limitations on the default ff pacakge temp directory - getOptions('fftempdir') - you can change the directory used as the fftempdir with this option.

param.label: maxt
param.name: maxt
param.help: maximum time difference to calculate retention similarity for - all values beyond this are assigned similarity of zero

param.name: batch

param.name: order
param.help: vector with length equal to number of injections in xset or csv file

param.label: qc
param.name: qc
param.help: vector with length equal to number of injections in xset or csv file.
